body: So as some if you guys know I made the changed from the username BWD to Hentry, which is as close as I'll ever get to my real name since the guy who has it probably doesn't even play the game anymore. Anyways with that new name came a new skin with the only article of clothing that looks good on me besides a Casio... a white shirt :p so as a joke I decided to do an unofficial group called the White Shirt/ Hoodie Group just to be funny and all you have to do is have a skin with a white shirt or some sort of thing like that. If you see me in game and saw this post type in pub chat #makeavicusbetterthabitalreadyiswithsmiles have a good day guys ;)

replies.body:
Hey there,

That's really cool and I hope you enjoy your new change :)!

But sadly, post regarding a certain players accomplishments or achivements aren't allowed. Therefore, I'm going to go ahead and lock this. 

Regards, Josh/Acceqted

Enjoy your new changes!
